page.title: 13Ann's day in Wishford.
page.content: I get up in the morning at 7.15am and prepare the children's breakfast and my husband's, who comes in at 7.30am.At 7.30am I call the children and then serve breakfast.After breakfast I go outside to feed the goats and milk them.After milking I tether the goats. At 8.45am we leave for school.It is a five minute journey by car.From 9.00am to 11.00am I do the housework. After this I may garden,knit or make corn-dollies.Following this I do some cooking and have lunch. I collect the children from school by car at 3.15pm then when we get home I prepare and cook tea.At 7.30pm I get the three children to bed after which I bring the goats in.From 8.45pm to about 11.oopm I watch televison or read and then go to bed.
